mapper.select: SELECT seriesNo, compBeginDate, extent, roughness FROM TIMESERIES WHERE compbegindate = (select max(compbegindate) from timeseries)
SELECT seriesNo, compBeginDate, extent, roughness FROM TIMESERIES WHERE compbegindate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{weekAgo},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{dateSelected},'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT seriesNo, compBeginDate, extent, roughness FROM TIMESERIES WHERE compbegindate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{dBegin},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{dEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY compbegindate ASC
SELECT seriesNo, compBeginDate, extent, roughness FROM TIMESERIES_MONTHLY WHERE compbegindate = (select max(compbegindate) from timeseries_monthly)
SELECT seriesNo, compBeginDate, extent, roughness FROM TIMESERIES_MONTHLY WHERE compbegindate = TO_DATE(#{dateSelected},'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT seriesNo, compBeginDate, extent, roughness FROM TIMESERIES_MONTHLY WHERE compbegindate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{dBegin},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{dEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY compbegindate ASC
